title: Representations - Diff Eq - Motion along a Line

content.question: Which of the following is an expression for the position of the particle at time <math alttext="t is greater than or equal to 0" overflow="scroll"> <mrow> <mi>t</mi> <mo>â‰¥</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> </math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="6 times t cubed, plus 2 t, plus 5" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="2 times t cubed, plus 2 t, plus 5" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 times t cubed, plus 2 t, plus 5" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
